allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Tab Expense Tracker

Implemented core features:
- MVVM architecture with Jetpack Compose
- Room database for local storage
- Google Sheets API integration
- SMS parsing with regex patterns
- Currency toggle \(MVR/USD conversion\)
- Notification service for SMS detection
- Material Design 3 theming \(light/dark mode\)
- GitHub Actions CI/CD workflow

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(reference: parse" compilation error.

All 6 SMS patterns are still supported.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command '$env:GH_TOKEN = \(& ""C:\\Program Files\\GitHub CLI\\gh.exe"" auth token\); git push origin main')

Bash(SyncExpenseWorker"

Expected behavior:
- Edit: Expense updates locally, shows "Syncing", then syncs to Sheets
- Delete: Expense removes from app, stays in Sheets as historical data

Version: 1.1.1-edit-sync-logs
